Now, I would like to announce the results of the

participated. I'm sure you all know who the
winner is, but for formality's sake...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In first, <BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE>, with a total <MOJI0>
count of <MOJI1>! <BLUE><CHARANAME1></BLUE>, you
came in second with <MOJI2>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First, <BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE>, with <MOJI1>!
Second, <BLUE><CHARANAME1></BLUE>, with <MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<MOJI0> count of <MOJI1>. And
<BLUE><CHARANAME1></BLUE> is in fourth with <MOJI2>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

challenge.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE> wins the challenge.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

<PAGE>

face one another again, let it be once again as

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>I did it! I won! Hard work really does pay! It's not

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heh. Well fought, my rival. But you will not be
so lucky next time!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

will not allow you to win so easily next time!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'll accept my loss this once. However, next
time...I will win.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I guess I shouldn't have expected any less
from a farmer of your ability, <MYNAME>. It's
sad, but I suppose I can accept this loss.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Next time will be a different story, however!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very well done, <MYNAME>. Goodness,
sometimes having a capable husband can be so
problematic!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I hate to say it, but I lost, fair and square. The
results will be different next time, though, so
you'd best watch out!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations. You've become an excellent
farmer. I'm very happy for you, dear.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>

<PAGE>

swear!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>

<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll clean up the field and have it ready for you by
